author: Woo Bih Li J:
casename: Chee Siok Chin and Another v Attorney-General
counsel: M Ravi (M Ravi & Co) for the plaintiffs; Jeffrey Chan (Attorney-General's Chambers) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Courts and Jurisdiction/Judges/Application for judge to recuse himself on ground of suspicion or likelihood of bias but not actual bias arising from prior unrelated acrimonious exchange between counsel for applicants and judge/Whether judge should recuse himself/Factors to consider
